Class Controller

java.lang.Object
mains.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
public class Controller extends Object implements ActionListener
GUI Controller for the program. Carried over from previous project for CSARCH2
Author:
Escalona, Jose Miguel

    • validNetwork

      private boolean validNetwork()
      Checks if network configuration on GUI is valid or not. This in terms if there is input or not. Displays warning if invalid.
      Returns:
      True if fields for IP and port are filled, false if not.
